# post-autocomplete-trigger



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description                                                | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `for` _(required)_ | `for`     | ID of the dropdown element that this trigger is linked to. | `string` | `undefined` |


## Methods

### `getDropdown() => Promise<HTMLPostAutocompleteDropdownElement>`

Returns the dropdown linked to the trigger.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<HTMLPostAutocompleteDropdownElement>`
